question:
[Sharon] and her grandmother were trying on makeup together. [Nicole] was giving the girl some tips. [Lucille]'s mother, [April], thought [Lucille] should wear a black dress. [Lucille]'s sister [Toni], however, thought she would look better in a blue one. [April] asked her daughter, [Sharon], if she would like to go to a movie with her on Saturday night.
Question: How is [Nicole] related to [Toni]?
